channel.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
channel.description: What is the best moneymaking skill? pls post

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:32, topic:273988"][quote author=haticks link=topic=362034.msg2809329#msg2809329 date=1243896293]

[quote author=Niall link=topic=362034.msg2809298#msg2809298 date=1243895503]

Mining is better money-wise.
But, Mining 78k ore would take a year…[/quote]

…and it’d take 10 years on rune ore, since I’ve been playing, the only rune ore I’ve seen available is the odd ore on wildy, which someone logged into mine.

There’s actually some on the Legends’ Guild.

Yes but the problem is you’ll have people world hopping to mine it, in the wildy it didn’t happen so much for obvious reasons.
[/quote]It still doesn’t…That area of the wildy is dangerous… I died…with a santa, to a rev

Deserve to die with it if you knew it was dangerous, yet took it there anyway. Though, you probably didn’t lose it unless you’re retarded.[/quote]I don’t read updates. I heard pking was removed so i figured wildy was safe now…It isn’t.

Read full topic

Mining is better money-wise.
But, Mining 78k ore would take a year…[/quote]

There’s actually some on the Legends’ Guild.

Yes but the problem is you’ll have people world hopping to mine it, in the wildy it didn’t happen so much for obvious reasons.
[/quote]It still doesn’t…That area of the wildy is dangerous… I died…with a santa, to a rev :([/quote]

Deserve to die with it if you knew it was dangerous, yet took it there anyway. Though, you probably didn’t lose it unless you’re retarded.

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Dalcian, post:21, topic:273988”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=362034.msg2804724#msg2804724 date=1243656349]

Hunter - Hunting chins, 35m 70 - 99, Doesn’t take that long. I’ve seen people get 70 - 99 in like 2 weeks (no lifeing)

I got 70-99 in about 2 1/2 weeks or so, doing 2-2.5k chins a day, but that was back in early 07 before many people hunted. It’d probably take alot longer now since the hunter spots are usually packed now (last I heard that is, haven’t hunted since I got that 99 over two years ago). I ended up making around 34mil total, your info is correct.
[/quote]

Lol, Something I haven’t asked you, What is your combat level?[/quote]

I had an account that was level 132, but I gave that away to my friend when I quit a few months back. Although, my first account, that got unbanned a few days ago, is 114 combat (was banned before summoning, so it’ll be rising soon).

Read full topic

Hunter - Hunting chins, 35m 70 - 99, Doesn’t take that long. I’ve seen people get 70 - 99 in like 2 weeks (no lifeing)

snip

I was actually talking about free-to-play.
[/quote]

Are you retarded?[/quote]

I was wondering the same thing about you. :rolleyes:

I haven’t played RuneScape in a while anyways.
[/quote]

You should of mentioned you were talking about f2p…

item.source: What is the best moneymaking skill?

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Dalcian, post:21, topic:273988”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=362034.msg2804724#msg2804724 date=1243656349]

Hunter - Hunting chins, 35m 70 - 99, Doesn’t take that long. I’ve seen people get 70 - 99 in like 2 weeks (no lifeing)

I got 70-99 in about 2 1/2 weeks or so, doing 2-2.5k chins a day, but that was back in early 07 before many people hunted. It’d probably take alot longer now since the hunter spots are usually packed now (last I heard that is, haven’t hunted since I got that 99 over two years ago). I ended up making around 34mil total, your info is correct.
[/quote]

Lol, Something I haven’t asked you, What is your combat level?

–

I’d probably go with woodcutting.

Soul you’re an idiot. Don’t bother coming to this section. You don’t know shit.

Mining - 85 - 99 You make a shit load mining rune ore. Think about it. 13k - 15k per ore
Hunter - Hunting chins, 35m 70 - 99, Doesn’t take that long. I’ve seen people get 70 - 99 in like 2 weeks (no lifeing)
Runecraft - You make about 200m+. After 91 and nats double. You’d be loaded.
Fishing (Sharks) - You make something like 40m+ 76 - 99

So overall.

Mining and runecraft are the best.

Mining - 85 - 99 = 78,207 rune ore.
Rune ore: 14.5k MID
78,207 x 14,500
= 1,134,001,500
Thats over one bill… Fucking loaded.

RuneCraft - 44 - 91 = 649,687 (44 is level required for nats)
Pure essence: 144 MID
Nature: 228 MID
228 - 114 x 649,687
= 74,064,318
Remember, Thats just to 91.

91 - 99 Runecraft = 792,400
Nats now double so…
Pure ess: 114 MID
Nature: 228 MID
You get one extra nat per essence…
228 - 114 + 228 x 792,400 = 271,000,800

Mining is better money-wise.
But, Mining 78k ore would take a year…

I was actually talking about free-to-play.

Are you retarded?[/quote]

I was wondering the same thing about you. :rolleyes:

I haven’t played RuneScape in a while anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best moneymaking skill?

Mining - 85 - 99 You make a shit load mining rune ore. Think about it. 13k - 15k per ore
Hunter - Hunting chins, 35m 70 - 99, Doesn’t take that long. I’ve seen people get 70 - 99 in like 2 weeks (no lifeing)

= 1,134,001,500

= 74,064,318

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

The Soul:

I’d probably go with woodcutting.

Soul you’re an idiot. Don’t bother coming to this section. You don’t know shit.

Mining - 85 - 99 You make a shit load mining rune ore. Think about it. 13k - 15k per ore
Hunter - Hunting chins, 35m 70 - 99, Doesn’t take that long. I’ve seen people get 70 - 99 in like 2 weeks (no lifeing)
Runecraft - You make about 200m+. After 91 and nats double. You’d be loaded.
Fishing (Sharks) - You make something like 40m+ 76 - 99
Slayer - You can’t really tell how much you’d make from slayer. Depends on what your tasks are. Like if you constantly get black drags, abysaal demons, dark beasts. You’d be loaded in no time.
Woodcutting - Not quite sure, Depends on what you do. I’m 93 wc, I tried getting 99 just doing mages. Takes forever. < I don’t recommend woodcutting.

So overall.

Mining and runecraft are the best.

Mining - 85 - 99 = 78,207 rune ore.
Rune ore: 14.5k MID
78,207 x 14,500
= 1,134,001,500
Thats over one bill… Fucking loaded.

RuneCraft - 44 - 91 = 649,687 (44 is level required for nats)
Pure essence: 144 MID
Nature: 228 MID
228 - 114 x 649,687
= 74,064,318
Remember, Thats just to 91.

91 - 99 Runecraft = 792,400
Nats now double so…
Pure ess: 114 MID
Nature: 228 MID
You get one extra nat per essence…
228 - 114 + 228 x 792,400 = 271,000,800

Mining is better money-wise.
But, Mining 78k ore would take a year…

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Farming, snapdragons will make you alot over time, also Runecrafting, by far the most money you can make in RS with x2 nature runes. Although, if you’re not much of a skiller, just stick to monster hunting, or slayer.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best moneymaking skill?

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?

item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:11, topic:273988”]What on Earth do you need 99 Firemaking for? It’s just a waste of money to train it, and the Skill-cape you get isn’t worth the resources you spent on it.[/quote]Because its an easy skill to get a high rank in, and it doesn’t really take that long - plus if you don’t care about selling your logs you could just burn them after say you get 99 fletching.

item.title: What is the best moneymaking skill?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Ranarrs make slow cash, over a period of 6 hours I made 100k… Mining pure ess is good if you can bot it, I could make ~800k overnight (12am - 7am) botting pure ess varrock east bank.
